Articles.Content:
please help find this problem ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif), running on OS X,

i posted on this section again rather than the modded install section as its happening again even with fresh installs here is a pic of the problem, i have to go in and out of the van for them to re-appear.

before i thought i found the problem was similar to a windows problem that some are having and still could be a corrupted game save, but it will continue to play and save but needs the in and out of vab for the menus to appear again.

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/mben1pa00m9sw1j/screenshot0.png?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/mben1pa00m9sw1j/screenshot0.png?dl=0)

You can link the actual picture to the post using [ img ] and [ /img ] (or the 4th icon from the right on the quickreply toolbar).

Having looked it up, I'm frankly baffled... someone else better field this one.

haha, yea you see my problem, theres a thread about the nearly same thing on windows, but i have tried with and without mods, adding them slowly, it just randomly happens, and while its fixed going out and then back into the vab, its pretty annoying and picks up more problems as it goes on

I have the same issue on my modded Windows save. I thought it was due to some mods, but seemingly it isn't.

Going to follow this thread closely.

yea i have heard of it on windows, but never yet on mac, but i now cannot play a game without it happening at some point, it seems to come after landing at minmus, and IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m sure its a corrupted save causing the problem, well from my experimenting

![hb4yN-SJ78DgaNP_79YMv5zYSPTEoWXMDh7XrKrgjWs?size=1280x960&size_mode=2](https://photos-6.dropbox.com/t/2/AAB_OPyAHmy4WjUbRw0ueULi9O8V8ZysbzoTpSKbOjmP7w/12/470127499/png/32x32/1/1443034800/0/2/screenshot0.png/CIunluABIAEgAiADIAQgBSAGIAcoBw/hb4yN-SJ78DgaNP_79YMv5zYSPTEoWXMDh7XrKrgjWs?size=1280x960&size_mode=2)This is the screenshot OP's links leads to.
thanks dude, was on my other comp so i couldnt add till i got home late tonight
hmmm, not a lot of input from this, is it a bug that needs to be reported ? if so where do i report it. thanks
